LanguageData.Autobong.label: autobong
LanguageData.Autobong.description: An automatic smokeleaf-burning device which generates a smoke cloud around itself. Anyone in the cloud will become high on smokeleaf over time.
LanguageData.Drum.label: drum
LanguageData.Drum.description: A large wooden drum used as a music source for tribal rituals and parties.
LanguageData.DryadCocoon.label: dryad cocoon
LanguageData.DryadCocoon.description: A sphere of fibrous plant matter. A dryad inside is slowly morphing into a new form. Gauranlen trees grow these spheres to help protect the dryads as they morph.
LanguageData.DryadHealingPod.label: dryad healing pod
LanguageData.DryadHealingPod.description: A sphere of fibrous plant matter. A dryad inside is slowly healing its wounds.
LanguageData.GaumakerCocoon.label: gaumaker pod
LanguageData.GaumakerCocoon.description: The result of the merging of several Gaumaker dryads, this symbiotic plant/animal pod is an essential part of the Gauranlen life cycle. After some time, it will flower into a mature Gauranlen pod which can be harvested to plant a new Gauranlen tree.
LanguageData.GibbetCage.label: gibbet cage
LanguageData.GibbetCage.description: A steel cage for holding and displaying corpses. This horrifying sight inspires terror and disgust in observers. It is an especially brutal and effective way to terrorize slaves.
LanguageData.KneelPillow.label: kneel pillow
LanguageData.KneelPillow.description: A pillow on which believers kneel while observing rituals, praying, or discussing.
LanguageData.KneelSheet.label: kneel sheet
LanguageData.KneelSheet.description: A sheet on which believers kneel while observing rituals, praying, or discussing.
LanguageData.Lectern.label: lectern
LanguageData.Lectern.description: A slanted platform that holds a text in front of a speaker. Place it near the focus of rituals and speeches to extend the duration of their positive effects.
LanguageData.LightBall.label: lightball
LanguageData.LightBall.description: A decorative light that rotates and changes colors. Used as a focus for dance parties.
LanguageData.Loudspeaker.label: loudspeaker
LanguageData.Loudspeaker.description: A large loudspeaker for playing music. At least one is necessary to hold a dance party, and more loudspeakers will enhance the effect.
LanguageData.Pew.label: pew
LanguageData.Pew.description: A long bench where ritual participants can sit while listening to a speaker. Place it facing rituals and speeches to extend the duration of their positive effects.
LanguageData.PlantPot_Bonsai.label: bonsai pot
LanguageData.PlantPot_Bonsai.description: This special pot is suitable for planting bonsai trees, which can improve the mood of people nearby and satisfy ideoligious requirements.
LanguageData.Reliquary.label: reliquary
LanguageData.Reliquary.description: A ceremonial building that protects and displays a relic. Relics are ancient objects venerated by some cultures, belief systems, or religions.
LanguageData.Skullspike.label: skullspike
LanguageData.Skullspike.description: A spike mounted upright for the purpose of piercing and displaying a human skull. To some, displayed skulls are a symbol of power. To others, they represent barbaric evil. Skullspikes are an especially brutal and effective way to terrorize slaves.
LanguageData.SlabBed.label: slab bed
LanguageData.SlabBed.description: A slab of hard material made to sleep on. Slab beds are uncomfortable, but some see their use as a demonstration of moral good.
LanguageData.SlabDoubleBed.label: slab double bed
LanguageData.SlabDoubleBed.description: A slab of hard material made to sleep on. Slab beds are uncomfortable, but some see their use as a demonstration of moral good. This one is wide enough to fit two people.
LanguageData.StylingStation.label: styling station
LanguageData.StylingStation.description: A table with a mirror and styling tools. People can use this to change their look.
